body: Not gonna get an eng version, this is licensed by Fakku, but chapter 1 tells the story about a guy that gets the usual app for hypnotizing on his cellphone then he uses that in a few girls, the girl in this chap is the sister of one of his preys and is the classic married teacher that only knows his husband's dick and then he destroys her pussy with his technique, in the end the teacher says "I'll break free from this hypnotism and get back my sister" which implies that MAYBE she will do it and the guy gets punished or we get the usual corrupted pussy from overwhelming pleasure.
